mapper.sql: Activity_ID, Activity_AgentID, Activity_Title, Activity_ImageID, Activity_CreateTime, Activity_ModifyTime, Activity_Status, Activity_Hot, Activity_Weight, Activity_WeChatID, Activity_Praise, Activity_EndTime, Activity_StartTime, Activity_Sponsor, Activity_SBrief, Activity_SImage, Activity_ApplyCount, Activity_ApplyLimit, Activity_ApplyMoney, Activity_PayType, Activity_AreaCode, Activity_Place, Activity_Money, Activity_Type, Activity_Delete, Activity_LaunchTime
mapper.select:
select
,( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM rb_payrecords WHERE PayRecord_BelongId = Activity_ID AND PayRecord_UserID = #{DBID} AND PayRecord_PayReason LIKE CONCAT('%',#{Screen},'%')) AS Activity_Qualified ,
from rb_activity where 1 = 1
AND Activity_ID = #{ID,jdbcType=BIGINT}
AND Activity_Delete = 0

select
,
from rb_activity where Activity_ID = #{activityId} AND Activity_Delete = 0
select Activity_ApplyMoney from rb_activity where Activity_ID = #{activityId} AND Activity_Delete = 0

( (SELECT
,( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM rb_payrecords WHERE PayRecord_BelongId = Activity_ID AND PayRecord_UserID = #{DBID} AND PayRecord_PayReason LIKE CONCAT('%',#{Screen},'%')) AS Activity_Qualified
,
FROM rb_activity WHERE 1=1 AND Activity_Delete = 0 AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(Activity_EndTime) ) UNION ALL (
SELECT
,( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM rb_payrecords WHERE PayRecord_BelongId = Activity_ID AND PayRecord_UserID = #{DBID} AND PayRecord_PayReason LIKE CONCAT('%',#{Screen},'%')) AS Activity_Qualified
,
FROM rb_activity
) UNION ALL ( SELECT
,( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM rb_payrecords WHERE PayRecord_BelongId = Activity_ID AND PayRecord_UserID = #{DBID} AND PayRecord_PayReason LIKE CONCAT('%',#{Screen},'%')) AS Activity_Qualified
,
FROM rb_activity WHERE 1=1 AND Activity_Delete = 0 AND UNIX_TIMESTAMP(NOW()) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(Activity_EndTime) AND Activity_Place NOT LIKE CONCAT(#{Address},'%') )) ORDER BY Activity_ModifyTime ASC LIMIT #{start},#{size}

select Activity_ApplyMoney,Activity_PayType,Activity_StartTime,Activity_EndTime,Activity_ApplyCount,Activity_ApplyLimit from rb_activity WHERE Activity_ID = #{activityId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND Activity_Delete = 0
